name: Soul Chase
description:
Important: This is a mobile game which I ported to PC so you guys could try it out!

The PC controls are:

move: WASD

attack: J

jump: K

This was originally a project called "Nighty Knight", game I made for a 2 day game jam. And now I have been developing it for Android :D

if youre interested in the project, download the beta version in Google Play Store:

https://play.google.com/apps/testing/com.harambertgames.soulchase
